query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Service design toolkit
result.description: A webbased toolkit with methodologies tools methods and tactics for supporting cities with the adoption of a usercentric approach at different stages of design and delivery of public services for citizens and businesses The toolbox will be a dedicated minisite integrated in the main project site Prior to the final version two mockup versions of the toolbox M8 M14 and of a functional prototype M21 will be codeveloped with partners

result.title: Online best practice repository
result.description: An online repository of exemplary usercentric services including services from partners and additional ones from nonpartners Accepted services in the repository will be categorized according to use cases The repository will be a dedicated minisite integrated in the main project site and its development will take place in two iterations M46 M1416

result.title: Indicators handbook
result.description: The deliverable will provide the operational definition the list of indicators and the operational guidelines for cities to adopt in order to contribute to the dashboard The handbook is designed for the final users it is readable and illustrated with screenshots But it also includes the modality of computation of various aggregate indicators

result.title: Annual reports on the State of User-Centricity
result.description: Every year based on the data submitted by cities a summary report will be produced It is a welldesigned professionally edited publication with the goal of wide distribution to policy makers It will provide a snapshot of cities progress as well as case studies of excellent services

result.title: Security Analysis of mGov4EU Pilots
result.description: This deliverable provides a security analysis of mGov4EU pilots on architectural level. The deliverable introduces a security-analysis framework and describes security risks identified by applying this framework to the mGov4EU pilots. Furthermore, this deliverable elaborates on risk-mitigating countermeasures derived from identified risks to improve the overall security of mGov4EU pilots.

result.title: Summary of Dissemination, Communication and Exploitation Activities
result.description: This deliverable will summarise the activities towards ongoing communications, including measures taken to disseminate the mGov4EU aims to the stakeholder community and will describe the detailed communication tools and collaterals. This report also describes the exploitation activities, including a summary of executed activities since project start and addressing activities beyond project lifetime.

result.description: Drawing on the results of the pilot and the effectiveness of the platform this report will develop a model based on experiences and best practice for introducing disruptive technologies into public services It will additionally feed into the business plan

result.title: A final baseline and benchmarking study database for conditions of employment and unemployment
result.description: This study which will include a database and narrative report aims to produce a baseline study which compiles basic data on multidimensional factors and predictive values related to employment and unemploymentThe study will employ quantitative and qualitative methods for prospective study on human resources of companies and counsellors of unemployment office casecontrol design standardized interviews a baseline survey and benchmarking it will draw on the initial study D25 and analysis of the pilot to provide a picture of conditions of employment and unemployment

result.title: Impact Measurement Report
result.description: The expected impacts of the research are outlined in the proposal document They are linked to a set of objectives OB1OB5 and in certain cases Milestones Throughout the life of the project WP and Task leads will measure and report on the activities of their WP andor task These reports will be combined into a public report at the conclusion of the documentHowever impact assessment is required after this phase of the project is concluded This is important for future exploitation and dissemination and measurement methods and sponsibilities will be outlined in deliverable D74
